dt: {bc}any of a family (Tetraodontidae) of chiefly tropical scaleless marine bony fishes which can distend themselves to a globular form and most of which are highly poisonous
{bc}any of various fish of the same order (Tetraodontiformes) as the puffer fish

shortdef: any of a family (Tetraodontidae) of chiefly tropical scaleless marine bony fishes which can distend themselves to a globular form and most of which are highly poisonous —called also blowfish, globefish, swellfish
any of various fish of the same order (Tetraodontiformes) as the puffer fish
